description.value:
The Bastion represents the desire to protect, and the understanding that all forms of Defense can be used as a great offense. The Bastion's Shield exemplifies this need to protect others, and the lengths one will go to help them.

Constellation: @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.deities.Item.3PJqDBXSNoaagwY8]{The Bastion}

First Asterism (Level 1): You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.w8Ycgeq2zfyshtoS]{Reactive Shield} feat. If you have a weapon with the parry trait, you can use this reaction to position your weapon to parry instead. If you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield} or a similar cantrip, you can cast the cantrip as a reaction.

Second Asterism (Level 6, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block}) You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.5vXc2s2siR1ihpBT]{Shield Warden} feat. You can use Shield or a similar cantrip for the Shield Block, if you are able to cast them.

Third Asterism (Level 10, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block}) You gain the @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.feats.Item.LYZGl61pUlFOR9Dh]{Shield Intervention} feat. You can cast Shield or a similar cantrip for raising a shield and blocking with it, if you are able to cast them.
